name: iPlaySeneca
description:
Take Seneca Resorts & Casinos with you where you go! Enjoy free-to-play versions of your favorite slot titles from the palm of your hand including Kronos™, Spartacus Gladiator of Rome™, Hot Shot Blazing 777™ and more! With free credits awarded every 4 hours, don’t wait – play now!

Also, get up-to-date information and directions for any of our locations:
• Seneca Niagara Resort & Casino
• Seneca Buffalo Creek Casino
• Seneca Allegany Resort & Casino
• Seneca Hickory Stick Golf
